name: I want to be alone!
description:
Game makes for : Trijam #152

This game is about a gray and boring world where there's nothing interesting. 
These small, stupid people does not see anything, but only You.
You are a famous person, and one and only light in this world, but sometimes, you just want to be alone, and this day has come. Your purpose is to alone be as much as possible. 

Share your results in comments, it would be interesting to see your high-scores, share feedback about this game, we are going to be happy to respond. 

Use WASD - to move

Authors:
 babosik - Art Designer
Dsinkerii - Programmer
pa_pasha - Sound Designer

Engine - Unity3D
Models - Blender
Shaders - RealRoonShader
